FontString.name: $parentTopText
FontString.text: Item Name Long Long Long Long Long

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine('Item is on player\'s Wishlist', 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

FontString.name: $parentName
FontString.text: [longest item name ever ever ever ever ever ever]

FontString.name: $parentName
FontString.text: longest item name ever ever ever ever ever ever

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT", 28, -8) GameTooltip:AddLine('Pass', 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine('Shift-Click to add this item \nto your Need Blacklist', 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
